#Installation Instructions.

= Introduction =

This page tries to give installation instructions.  The instructions are listed from order of the author's general preference.


= Details =

This not exaustive:
  * RPMs
    # Download RPM from Downloads section. (or do setup.py bdist_rpm ).
    # rpm -Uvh python-port25-version.noarch.rpm
  * pip
    # pip install python-port25 (especially recommended for virtualenv use).
  * setup.py
    # python setup.py install
